name: Minerals Sourcing Information
description: Information regarding how minerals are sourced

subCriterion.name: CO-1
subCriterion.description: New Question - How many countries of origin for primary materials, including mined materials, non-secondary metal products derived from mined materials, and/or intermediate material derived from non-secondary material?

subCriterion.name: ISM-1
subCriterion.description: New Question - How many supplying pinch-points in the supply chain of the facility? (Supplying pinch-points include smelters, refiners, processors)

subCriterion.name: SRM-1
subCriterion.description: New Question - How many countries of origin are used to source secondary material?

subCriterion.name: HR-1
subCriterion.description: Does the facilty have any high-risk supply chains?

subCriterion.name: HR-2
subCriterion.description: How many Red-flag suppliers and Conflict-Affected and High-Risk Areas and red flag(s) identified in the supply chain?

subCriterion.name: TU-1
subCriterion.description: COBALT / GOLD / PRECIOUS METALS ONLY: How many Crude Refiners / Aggregators / Treatment Units have been assessed by the facility?

subCriterion.name: AM-1
subCriterion.description: New Question - Has the facility determined if it sources minerals from ASM or not?

subCriterion.name: UP-1
subCriterion.description: Is the facility engaged in any upstream mechanisms?

subCriterion.name: UP-1a
subCriterion.description: Please list all upstream mechanisms in which the company is engaged or participates or provides other forms of support.

subCriterion.name: UP-1b
subCriterion.description: Please list all upstream mechanisms in which the company is an active member (please provide proof such as a link to membership page).

subCriterion.name: UP-1c
subCriterion.description: Please list all upstream mechanisms from which the company has received shipments assured by that mechanism during the assessment period.

subCriterion.name: UP-2
subCriterion.description: Is due diligence conducted using an upstream assurance mechanism for ALL materials sourced from CAHRAs?

subCriterion.name: UP-2a
subCriterion.description: Have all mechanisms been independently assessed and found aligned with OECD Guidance?

subCriterion.name: UP-2b
subCriterion.description: OECD Alignment Comments

subCriterion.name: UP-2c
subCriterion.description: Are all upstream assurance mechanisms recognized by RMI?

subCriterion.name: UP-2d
subCriterion.description: Comments for RMI Recognized assurance mechanisms

subCriterion.name: UP-2e
subCriterion.description: If not RMI recognized, have you provided proof that the upstream assurance mechanism is OECD aligned?

subCriterion.name: UP-2f
subCriterion.description: Please enter additional comments here. Note: if any mechanisms have been recognized by the EU or LME, provide link to website as proofpoint.
